Hi Tracy,

If you study human agent poltergeist cases of psychokinesis, the 
identified human agent is always in the house of structure when the 
objects move.

The famous Miami Hotel case that Dr. William Roll investigated is a 
great example. When a certain kitchen worker was present, all sorts 
of objects were thrown around the room. When he was not there, 
nothing happened. When he left the Hotel for good, no more activity 
was ever recorded.

I would like to try to rule out, or, support the theory that we are 
not, or that we might be imprinting EVP's on audio tracks or tape.

My own personal experience in EVP gathering leads me to believe that 
this is phenomena driven, not my subconscious mind.

But now I have to try and find out the truth for myself.

This last year we saw an incredible amount of EVP's being recorded 
during our cases we investigated. 

http://arizonaparanormalinvestigations.com/api_gallery/index.php?
cat=4

The above is our link to our new EVP gallery if you would like to 
listen to them. These were all recorded in the last year using  
multiple recorders in each location. There is a Grade A and a Grade 
B icon to seperate them.


James

>               Hi James,
> 
> Back when I still investigated haunted sites, our team did this on 
various occasions within a house where we recorded several hours of 
activity over a few years (a long term investigation). We would 
leave our audio equipment recording in several "hot spots" all over 
the house and then leave for an hour or two. I have to say, in our 
experience we never got an EVP while we were out of the house. As a 
matter of fact we had an EVP when we reentered the house 
saying, "here they come, lets go". I don't necessarily understand 
why a ghost or spirit would talk with no one present to receive the 
message unless during setup you explained what you are trying to 
accomplish and what the spirits roll is in the experiment (we never 
tried explaining). A piece of machinery (recorders) in an empty room 
does not have a consciousness or spiritual presence I would be 
interested to see if you get different results.
